subject: Track and Field
Doping (Sports)
lead_paragraph: Dennis Mitchell, who has a history of doping, was named to lead the USA Track & Field sprint teams at the IAAF World Relays in the Bahamas last week.
snippet: Dennis Mitchell, who has a history of doping, was named to lead the USA Track & Field sprint teams at the IAAF World Relays in the Bahamas last week.
